[#outcrop-lithology_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:plot-description:outcrop-lithology:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the soil lithology codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the soil lithology codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`
|Source | TERN Ecosystem Surveillance Ecological Monitoring Protocols
